Nice to meet you!

I'm a sophomore studying computer science and history of art @ [Yale University](https://www.yale.edu)

My interests surround finding ways to embed art and design within digital spaces. I've previously worked at the [Yale Center for British Art](https://britishart.yale.edu) and with Dallas-based artist [Taelor Fisher](https://www.taelorfisher.com).
